parameters.name: targets
parameters.description: Targets to build. May be rules or files.

parameters.name: --profile
parameters.description: Name of profile to use for configuring Snakemake. Snakemake will search for a corresponding folder in /etc/xdg/snakemake and /headless/.config/snakemake. Alternatively, this can be an absolute or relative path. The profile folder has to contain a file 'config.yaml'. This file can be used to set default values for command line options in YAML format. For example, '--cluster qsub' becomes 'cluster: qsub' in the YAML file. Profiles can be obtained from https://github.com/snakemake-profiles.

parameters.name: --snakefile
parameters.description: The workflow definition in a snakefile.

parameters.name: Other parameters
parameters.description: Use other Snakemake parameters. The parameters must be entered as they appear in the Help option and separated by single space.
